name: Roy Tang
text:
Haha inattempt nga isolve. Pinakamalapit si jang2, namiss lang nya kung ano ibig sabihin nung [2:]
The code converts a string s into binary equivalent of the ASCII code, i.e. 'ABa1' -> '01000001 01000010 01100001 00110001'
Ang purpose lang nung [2:] is that bin(...) function in python appends '0b' to the start of the string, i.e. '0b1000001' so it's effectively a substring starting from index 2.
Awarding 1pt each for effort haha
